Text: Thanks again for the fast upload and for giving us the news that it has been renewed. Yea!

Thank you from Texas for assuming the incredible responsibility for posting all Season 4 Heartland episodes!! 

I look forward to Season 5 and your continued assistance.

You are truly a legend and a hero to countless fans around the world.
Thanks, this is a great series. Really appreciate your efforts, job well done.
I am looking for season 3 episodes 6 & 7 . Can't find them anywhere.
